controlled_vocabulary.comment: This table provides the restricted vocabulary for the column name in the table software to allow definition and searching of the software packages used in image and data analysis

term.name: ImaGene
term.description: BioDiscovery Inc(MatLab Gene Site, Auto Gene, Clone Tracker)

term.name: softWoRx
term.description: image analysis package from Applied Precision

term.name: GenePix_Pro
term.description: image analysis package from Axon Instruments

term.name: ScanAlyze
term.description: Image analysis software by Mike Eisen, Stanford U.

term.name: ArrayMaker
term.description: Spotter software by Joe Derisi, Stanford U.
